news.title: Tom Smith announces debut solo album and Irish tour dates
news.summary: The Editors frontman is set to perform five dates across Ireland in September, including Galway, Cork, Limerick, Kilkenny and Derry.

news.title: Poor Creature, The Bonk and Elaine Malone contribute to new benefit compilation for Palestine
news.summary: Conntribute is available as a digital album and on limited edition cassette tapes, with all proceeds donated to Medical Aid for Palestinians.

news.title: Bohemian FC and Annie Mac team up for women's away jersey
news.summary: The shirt is on pre-sale now, with all profits set to be shared between Bohemian FC and two local schools – enabling them to deliver improved music lessons, including DJ training, to their students.

news.title: Chris O'Dowd joins cast of film about OpenAI Artificial
news.summary: Artificial is from director Luca Guadagnino, who recently brought you Queer

news.title: Taylor Swift announces cover art, tracklist and release date for The Life of a Showgirl
news.summary: See the new album cover and full tracklist below.

news.title: Sinéad O’Connor biopic in development
news.summary: Directed by Josephine Decker, the film script is by Belfast-native playwright/screenwriter Stacey Gregg

news.title: Picture This Live at the Docklands (Photos)
Oasis in '09: "How many cunts were there in Oasis? Here’s a clue – it was more than zero and less than two"
news.summary: Ahead of Oasis’s sold-out Croke Park shows on August 16 & 17, we’re taking a deep-dive into the Hot Press archives – to hear Liam and Noel's incredible story in their own words...
